name: skeletor
description: Front-end boilerplate for static and single page app web development

scripts.build: yarn clean:build && yarn css:concat && yarn css:minify && yarn imagemin && node scripts/copy.js
scripts.build:babel: yarn css:concat && yarn css:minify && yarn imagemin && yarn babel
scripts.build:rollup: yarn css:concat && yarn css:minify && rollup --config config/rollup.prod.js
scripts.build:webpack: yarn css:concat && yarn css:minify && webpack --config config/webpack.prod.js
scripts.css:concat: cat src/css/settings/* src/css/global/* src/css/elements/* src/css/components/* src/css/utilities/* > src/styles.css
scripts.start: yarn css:concat && npm-run-all --parallel prettier:watch css:watch server:dev
scripts.start:rollup: yarn css:concat && npm-run-all --parallel prettier:watch css:watch server:rollup
scripts.start:webpack: yarn css:concat && npm-run-all --parallel prettier:watch css:watch server:webpack
scripts.use:rollup: yarn add -D rollup rollup-plugin-clear rollup-plugin-commonjs rollup-plugin-node-resolve rollup-plugin-copy rollup-plugin-generate-html-template rollup-plugin-terser
scripts.use:webpack: yarn add -D webpack webpack-bundle-analyzer webpack-cli webpack-dev-server webpack-merge optimize-css-assets-webpack-plugin mini-css-extract-plugin imagemin-webpack-plugin html-webpack-plugin copy-webpack-plugin css-loader file-loader babel-loader
